lectures.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
lectures.description: This lecture covers the basics of machine learning, including types of learning and common algorithms.

lectures.title: Supervised Learning
lectures.description: This lecture focuses on supervised learning techniques, including regression and classification.

lectures.title: Unsupervised Learning
lectures.description: This lecture covers unsupervised learning methods, such as clustering and dimensionality reduction.

labs.title: Lab 1: Data Preprocessing
labs.description: In this lab, you will learn how to preprocess data for machine learning.

labs.title: Lab 2: Model Training
labs.description: In this lab, you will train a machine learning model using a dataset.

labs.title: Lab 3: Model Evaluation
labs.description: In this lab, you will evaluate the performance of your machine learning model.
